name: treble.ai
headline: We help companies scale marketing campaigns through WhatsApp
description: We help companies build and scale marketing campaigns through WhatsApp, reaching their customers anywhere in the world with engaging conversations. With our platform, businesses can create and send conversations massively to users and get analytics to improve their campaign performance over time, increasing conversion in every stage of the funnel.

# Turn WhatsApp Messages into revenue
Our easy-to-use platform allows **companies that use HubSpot or Salesforce** to effectively communicate with their customers to engage, convert and retain them.
[ REQUEST A DEMO ](https://treble.ai/<https:/pages.treble.ai/schedule-demo>)
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](https://treble.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/heroIMG.webp)
#### 400+ pioneering brands rely on **treble.ai** to scale further and faster
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](https://treble.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/customers.webp)
## Meet the most effective WhatsApp Marketing platform​
**treble.ai** will help you revolutionize your customer engagement with the help of automated journeys that fuel business growth
![Easily create conversations in our Drag & Drop](https://treble.ai/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/conversationEN-2-1536x780.webp)Easily create conversations in our Drag & Drop
![Schedule deployments or use custom workflows](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='1536'%20height='780'%20viewBox='0%200%201536%20780'%3E%3C/svg%3E)Schedule deployments or use custom workflows
![Make data driven decisions with our advanced metrics](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='1536'%20height='786'%20viewBox='0%200%201536%20786'%3E%3C/svg%3E)Make data driven decisions with our advanced metrics
![Manage conversations and engage with your audience where they are](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='1536'%20height='781'%20viewBox='0%200%201536%20781'%3E%3C/svg%3E)Manage conversations and engage with your audience where they are
## Optimize every touchpoint and improve conversion at scale
Weâ€™ve combined our expertise in customer journey optimization with cutting-edge technology to create a platform that delivers results ðŸ“ˆ
###### Awareness
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='494'%20height='104'%20viewBox='0%200%20494%20104'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Consideration
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='625'%20height='103'%20viewBox='0%200%20625%20103'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Purchase
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='640'%20height='78'%20viewBox='0%200%20640%2078'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
###### Re-engagement & Loyalty
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='704'%20height='103'%20viewBox='0%200%20704%20103'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## See what our customers do on treble.ai and their results
Business from any industry and any size use **treble.ai** to reach the right customers at the right time with relevant and personalized messages that convert
### Response rate up to 85%​
With 480 USD investedand 1 conversation
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='387'%20height='363'%20viewBox='0%200%20387%20363'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### +20% Increase
On product activation using1 onboarding conversation
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='351'%20height='369'%20viewBox='0%200%20351%20369'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Up to 16X ROI​
With 2500 USD investedand 2 conversations
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='292'%20height='382'%20viewBox='0%200%20292%20382'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Features that make us unique
On time delivery
This feature uses data from our database to **predict the optimal time to send a message to a user.** By sending messages at the right time, we increase the likelihood that the user will respond, improving engagement and overall campaign performance.
Low engaged customers list
We use data analytics to help you identify users with a low probability of responding your messages. With this information, you can focus **your efforts on high-engagement users and optimize your budget for maximum impact**
treble.ai Agents
Enables your sales team to have personalized and real-time conversations with your customers on WhatsApp. Not only allows your team to respond quickly to customer inquiries but also provides an opportunity to build a relationship with your customers and create a personalized buying experience.
AB testing
**Discover what works best for your audience** with Trebleâ€™s AB testing. Test different versions of your content and analyze the results to optimize your messaging for maximum engagement and conversion.
Advanced analytics
Get a comprehensive view of your messaging performance with Trebleâ€™s advanced analytics section. View **read rates, response rates, and click-through rates** , and even track **specific customer replies to each message block** for deeper insights.
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='534'%20height='779'%20viewBox='0%200%20534%20779'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Bring in more data, drive more personalization with our integrations
#### HubSpot
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='155'%20height='154'%20viewBox='0%200%20155%20154'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Use treble.aiâ€™s HubSpot integration to streamline your sales and marketing automation. Sync your contacts, import data, and update properties seamlessly
[ Learn more ](https://treble.ai/<https:/pages.treble.ai/schedule-demo>)
#### Salesforce
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='488'%20height='477'%20viewBox='0%200%20488%20477'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Integrate WhatsApp with Salesforce without coding. Reduce data loss, gain traceability, and boost campaign effectiveness. Schedule a demo to learn more.
[ Learn more ](https://treble.ai/<https:/pages.treble.ai/schedule-demo>)
#### API Integrations
![treble.ai whatsapp marketing sales, Home EN](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20width='154'%20height='154'%20viewBox='0%200%20154%20154'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Simplify your workflow and reduce manual data entry with treble.aiâ€™s API integration, enabling data sharing and automation across your favorite tools and apps.
[ Learn more ](https://treble.ai/<https:/pages.treble.ai/schedule-demo>)
## Get up and running in less than 1 week
Turn WhatsApp into your #1 revenue channel with this four steps
[ REQUEST A DEMO ](https://treble.ai/<https:/pages.treble.ai/schedule-demo>)
  1. **Request your demo** and receive advice from one of our WhatsApp specialist
  2. Start a **Managed Trial Experience** and see results by yourself
  3. **After having great results** , you will buy our product
  4. **Growth** to infinity and beyond ðŸš€

generated_description:
**Company Overview: treble.ai**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's S19 batch, treble.ai is revolutionizing the way businesses engage with their customers through messaging, specifically on WhatsApp. Based in SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil, the company has a dedicated team of 38 employees focused on helping businesses scale their marketing campaigns globally. 

**Mission and Services**

Originally, treble.ai set out with a mission to assist companies in building and scaling marketing campaigns through WhatsApp, enabling them to reach customers through engaging conversations. Their platform allows businesses to create and send automated conversations to users while providing valuable analytics to improve campaign performance. This results in optimized conversion rates at every stage of the marketing funnel.

**Current Offerings**

- **WhatsApp Integration:** Treble.ai specializes in integrating with major platforms like HubSpot and Salesforce, allowing users to manage their campaigns efficiently.
- **AI Solutions:** Their offerings include Treble Boost, a feature designed to enhance campaign performance through automated user journeys and data-driven decisions.
- **Advanced Analytics:** Users can track engagement metrics such as read rates and response rates to gauge campaign success accurately.

**Customer Engagement and Results**

Treble.ai emphasizes personalized engagement, enabling businesses to send timely messages to users and manage conversations effectively. Their platform boasts impressive metrics, such as response rates up to 85% and an ROI of up to 16X for clients who invest in their services. 

**Key Features**

1. **On-Time Delivery:** Predicts the optimal time to send messages to achieve better engagement.
2. **Low Engagement Targeting:** Helps identify users who may not engage, allowing businesses to refocus efforts on higher potential contacts.
3. **Treble.ai Agents:** Facilitates real-time, personalized conversations between sales teams and customers.
4. **AB Testing:** Enables businesses to test messaging variations and refine based on audience response.
5. **API Integrations:** Streamlines workflows and reduces manual entry for users.

**Join the Movement**

Treble.ai's platform is not just about sending messages; itâ€™s about turning those messages into measurable revenue. With over 400 brands already leveraging its capabilities, treble.ai shows promise as a leader in WhatsApp marketing automation.

To learn more, you can visit their [website](https://treble.ai) and even schedule a demo to see how they can help supercharge your marketing campaigns.
